snippet.title: Inmost - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Inmost on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/938560/Inmost/

Inmost is an atmospheric, story-driven puzzle platformer, following three playable characters within one dark, interconnecting story. In an old abandoned castle, you’ll need to explore every nook and cranny, avoid detection, slice your way through enemies and spring deadly traps in order to escape the evil that lurks within… 

For more information and to keep up to date with the latest development news, visit the Inmost website: http://inmostgame.com/

Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/inmost/
Website: http://inmostgame.com/
Hidden Layer Games on Twitter: https://twitter.com/hlgteam
Chucklefish on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ChucklefishLTD

Developed by Hidden Layer Games, published by Chucklefish.
